name: Quorum - Shade - Toro
additionalNotes: Quorum cigars are manufactured by J.C. Newman Cigar Company. Each cigar is carefully crafted with a blend of Nicaraguan tobaccos and Ecuadorian wrappers including Colorado maduro, maduro, shade grown, and sun grown. These smokes give you a flavorful, smooth smoke with medium to full-bodied strength that appeals to seasoned smokers and beginners alike.
